summary: Completed comprehensive testing of MINEX GLOBAL crypto trading platform. All core features including 6-tier membership system, multi-level commission system (Lv.A/B/C), staking packages, manual USDT payment approval, withdrawal approval, and real-time commission distribution are working correctly. Fixed minor backend serialization issues.

fixed_issues.issue: MongoDB ObjectId serialization error preventing user registration
fixed_issues.fix_applied: Added ObjectId removal and enum serialization after database insert

fixed_issues.issue: MongoDB ObjectId serialization error in deposit creation
fixed_issues.fix_applied: Added ObjectId removal and enum serialization after database insert

passed_tests: Landing page loads with all sections (hero, packages, staking, community star)
Admin dashboard displays stats correctly (5 users, $100 deposits)
Deposit creation and admin approval flow
Withdrawal creation and admin approval flow
Real-time commission distribution on deposit approval
Platform settings API (USDT wallet, Community Star Program)
